game.name: Unfriendly Friend
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: From YOUR decisions, many people could get hurt. Can you save your friends or at least save yourself from the horror that awaits?
game.shortDescriptionEn: From YOUR decisions, many people could get hurt. Can you save your friends or at least save yourself from the horror that awaits?
